ciss_vae.classes.cluster_dataset.ClusterDataset

class ClusterDataset(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]
__init__(data, cluster_labels, val_percent=0.1, replacement_value=0, columns_ignore=None)[source]

Dataset that handles cluster-wise masking and normalization for VAE training.

Parameters:

  • data (-) – Input matrix with potential missing values.

  • cluster_labels (-) – Cluster assignment per sample.

  • val_percent (-) – Fraction of non-missing data per cluster to mask for validation.

  • replacement_value (-) – Value to fill in missing entries after masking (e.g., 0.0).

  • columns_ignore (-) – Optional list of column names (if data is a DataFrame) or indices (if array) to exclude from validation masking.

Methods

__init__(data, cluster_labels[, ...])

Dataset that handles cluster-wise masking and normalization for VAE training.

copy()

Creates a deep copy of the ClusterDataset method containing all attributes.
